p: In a search for new chemotherapeutic agents for trichomoniasis, Calzada et al. (2007) screened crude methanolic extracts of 22 Mexican medicinal plants commonly used for abdominal pain, colic, and vaginal discharge for antitrichomonal activity against T. vaginalis. In all, 22 plants belonging to 15 different families were assayed. The details of the plants and important experimental findings are shown in Table 5.
